generic.errorID: An unexpected error occurred. If you believe this wasn't meant to happen, please tell the support server the error ID: `{{errorID}}`.
generic.processingDescription: This command has not finished processing.
generic.insufficientArgs: Incorrect amount of arguments specified, for more information on this command, see `{{prefix}}help {{command}}`.
generic.guildOnlyError: This command can only be used in servers.
generic.permissionError: You do not have permission to run this command (You need the `{{permission}}` permission)
generic.discordPermissionError: You need the `{{permission}}` permission to use this command.
info.healthHelp: Shows health of the bot's shards
info.helpDescription:
I'm a multi-purpose discord bot that does music, moderation and other fun and useful things.
Do `{{prefix}}help <command>` for extended information on a command.

**Looking for support? [vexera.io/support](https://vexera.io/support)
Invite: [vexera.io/invite](https://vexera.io/invite)**
info.helpDM: Check your direct messages for a list of commands!
info.inviteHelp: Gets the URL to invite the bot.
premium.redeemHelp: Allows you to redeem a Vexera Premium key. Please note it will be activated on every server **you** own.
premium.redeemInvalid: Invalid key! Please ensure it is correct and not been already claimed.
premium.redeemSuccess: Success! Vexera Premium is now enabled on every server you own for **{{days}}** days.
premium.redeemAlreadyDonator: You already have an active key or subscription!
premium.redeemExtended: Success! Your Vexera Premium subscription has been extended by **{{days}}** days.
misc.userinfoCreation1: User joined at • {{dateJoined}} | User created at
perms.permsAddExists: That permission has already been added
perms.permsRemoveError: That permission has not been added, so it cannot be removed.
perms.permsHelp:
Assigns permissions to a role. For a list of permissions, see {{prefix}}perms nodes
Permissions handled by SexyPEX
perms.permsExample2: Dont allow the `Moderators` role to use the cat command
perms.permsExample3: Dont allow the user `luke` to use the doge command
perms.permsExample4: List the permissions for the `Moderators` role
perms.permsExample5: Remove the music permissions from everyone
perms.permsExample6: Clear the permissions for the `Moderators` role
perms.permsNodesDescription: Add `-` in front of a permission to deny it from a user.
admin.banPermissionError: You do not have permission to ban this user.
admin.banExample1: Bans user 'luke' for 1 week and two days with reason 'Advertising'
admin.muteExample1: Mutes user 'luke' for 1 week and two days with reason 'Spamming'
admin.kickPermissionError: You do not have permission to kick this user.
admin.softbanHelp: Softbans a user (cleans all messages from a user)
admin.softbanPermissionError: You do not have permission to kick this user.
admin.vckickHelp: Kicks a member from a voice channel
admin.vckickPermissionError: You do not have permission to voicekick this user.
admin.vckickBotPermissionError: I do not have permission to Manage Channels (or Move Members)
admin.mutePermissionError: You do not have permission to mute this user.
admin.muteSetupError: I do not have permission to set up the {{mutedRoleName}} role, please check I have the correct permissions.
admin.roleExample1: Add the `Admins` role to everyone with the `Moderators` role
admin.roleExample2: Add the user `luke` to the role `Admins`
admin.rolePermissionError: You do not have permission to manage that role.
admin.roleAddMass: Adding that role to `{{count}}` members, This may take a while...
admin.roleRemoveMass: Removing that role from `{{count}}` members, This may take a while...
admin.cleanPermissionError: I do not have permission to manage messages.
settings.greetingHelp: Sets a welcome message for the server.
settings.greetingExample1: Sends `Welcome @luke to <your server name>!` to #general when luke joins your server.
settings.greetingExample2: Welcomes a user to your server in direct messages.
settings.farewellHelp: Sets a message for when a user leaves the server.
settings.farewellExample1: Sends `luke left <your server>... bye bye luke..` to #general when luke leaves your server.
settings.farewellTextUndefined: You haven't specified a farewell message!
settings.prefixDisable: Successfully disabled the prefix. All commands should now be used like: `{{prefix}}ping`
settings.prefixSet: Successfully set the prefix. All commands should now be used like: `{{prefix}}ping`
settings.logHelp: Sets channels that will have events posted in them.
settings.logRemoveError: `{{event}}` has not been added, so it cannot be removed.
settings.modlogDisabled: Successfully disabled the moderation log channel.
settings.logExample1: Sends a message when a user joins or leaves
settings.modlogSet: Successfully set the moderation log channel.
settings.accessroleHelp: Sets a role that people have to have to use the bot. Use `{{prefix}}accessrole disable` to disable
settings.localeHelp: Sets a locale. See `{{prefix}}locale list` for a list of locales.
settings.localeNotComplete:
🚨 {{langname}}'s translation is only {{percentage}}% completed.
Want to help? Learn more at <{{url}}>.
settings.userlocaleHelp: Sets the locale for the user. See `{{prefix}}userlocale list` for a list of locales.
autorole.autoroleHelp: Assigns roles. Ensure the role for me is above the role you want me to give, otherwise I wont have permission.
autorole.autoroleExample1: Gives the role `Humans` to users on join.
autorole.autoroleExample2: Users can now do `{{prefix}}getrole Announcements` to get that role.
autorole.autoroleExample3: Bots will get this role when they join.
autorole.getroleHelp: Gets a role with the `get` condition from {{prefix}}autorole
autorole.getroleNoConditon: This role doesn't have the `get` condition, the owner can add it by doing `{{prefix}}autorole add get {{role}}`.
autorole.autoroleNoPermission: You cannot manage roles above yours.
fun.chucknorrisHelp: Responds with a chuck norris joke.
image.weebHelp: Shows some weeb images. See `{{prefix}}weeb types` for a list of types.
fun.emotifyHelp: Turns some text into an emoji
fun.yomammaHelp: Responds with yo mamma jokes, they will probably be insulting!
meme.illegalCharLimit: We all know Trump is stupid, He can't process that!
meme.illegalError: Trump messed up, I guess he didn't want to make that illegal!
misc.invitedHelp: Shows how many users someone has invited to a server.
misc.invitedNoPerm: I do not have permission to view invites.
fun.asciiHelp: Converts text into ASCII. A list of fonts can be found at https://github.com/patorjk/figlet.js/tree/master/fonts.
misc.wolframError: Something went wrong.. maybe try something else?
premium.donatorsHelp: Shows the top 10 donators with a personalised message set by the donator. Donators can set their message using `{{prefix}}donators <message>`
music.playerInactive: Left the channel due to inactivity.
music.playerErrorDescription: An error occurred while extracting information for this track.
music.playerErrorPlayingDescription: An error occurred while trying to play this track.
music.playHelp: Plays a track. A range of sites are supported.
music.playExample2: Plays a soundcloud track, using the direct URL
music.playExample3: Plays a youtube video, using the direct URL
music.playSearchUsage: Say the number of the track you wish to play (e.g '1') or say 'cancel' to cancel.
music.noVoiceChannel: You are not in a voice channel!
music.noJoinPermission: I do not have permission to join your voice channel.
music.joinError: An error occured while joining your voice channel.
music.enqueueMultiple: Added `{{resultLength}}` tracks to the queue (processed in `{{timeTaken}}` seconds)
music.skipHelp: Voteskips a track. Users with the `music.forceskip` permission can instantly skip.
music.skipAlreadyVoted: You have already voted to skip!
music.backHelp: Goes to the last track played.
premium.volumeHelp: Sets the volume of the music playing.
music.commandDonator: Only premium subscribers can use this command! For more information, see <https://vexera.io/premium>
music.premiumSpotifyError: Only Vexera Premium subscribers can load Spotify playlists! For more information, see <https://vexera.io/premium>.
music.premiumSpotifyAlternative: Alternatively, there are websites that can [convert Spotify playlists into Youtube playlists](https://bfnt.io/spotify-converter) which you can visit if you want to stay free.
music.premiumSpotifyProcessing: Processing Spotify playlist.. this may take some time.
premium.volumeLimit: Setting the volume to 150%. I want to protect your eardrums!
music.searchHelp: Allows you to choose a track to play with a fancy selection menu.
music.inactiveDisconnect: Left the voice channel due to inactivity.
music.donationMessage: If you enjoy Vexera's music feature, check out Vexera Premium to get the most from Vexera. <https://vexera.io/premium>
premium.autoplayHelp: Sets a track or playlist or livestream to play while the queue is empty.
premium.autoplayExample1: Enables autoplay with the specified URL.
music.jumpHelp: Jumps to a specific place in the queue.
premium.dumpHelp: Creates a URL with information about the music queue, which can be loaded with {{prefix}}play. Use {{prefix}}dump all to dump the whole queue.
premium.dumpCreated: Dump created! {{url}} - Use {{prefix}}play to load it.
music.lyricsHelp: Gets lyrics for a track / the track currently playing
info.nodeinfoHelp: Shows information about the voice nodes.
meme.handicappedHelp: Sir! This spot is for the handicapped only!
meme.magikHelp: The best command on the planet.
music.queueLimit: The queue can only hold 2000 tracks!
premium.premiumInfo: Vexera Premium offers a range of features for a small price. Learn more at https://vexera.io/premium
premium.premiumStatus: Checks the premium status of a user.
premium.statusDeclined: **Warning:** The payment for this pledge was declined. The user's premium features will be disabled on the 5th of this month.
premium.statusTransferredFrom: This user transferred their subscription to `{{tag}}`.
premium.statusTransferredTo: This user is the beneficiary of a subscription transfer from `{{tag}}`.
premium.statusNotDonator: This user is not a premium subscriber!
music.seekHelp: Seeks to a position in a track.
info.premiumExpiring: Your Vexera Premium Subscription is expiring in {{expire}}. To keep Vexera Premium, please visit https://vexera.io/premium.
music.deleteHelp: Deletes a track from the queue.
music.deletePlaying: I cannot delete the track I am currently playing.
premium.transferHelp: Transfers a premium subscription to another user, use `{{prefix}}transfer disable` to disable.
premium.transferSubscriptionExists: The user already has a subscription!
premium.transferActive: You already have an active transfer!
games.fortniteHelp: Looks up a user on fortnite.
premium.playlistNameMax: Playlist names can only be 20 characters long!
premium.playlistHelp: Allows you to save and load queues.
premium.playlistExample1: Creates the playlist 'Dubstep' from the tracks currently in the queue.
premium.playlistExample2: Loads the tracks from playlist 'Dubstep' into the queue.
premium.playlistExample4: Creates a dump URL for the playlist 'Dubstep'
modlog.none: You do not have a moderation log set!
admin.reasonHelp: Sets a reason for a mod log infraction.
settings.modlogHelp: Sets a channel which will log all infractions.
settings.rowboatHelp: Imports infractions in rowboat JSON format.
settings.rowboatWarning1: Warning! You are about to import `{{count}}` infractions. Say `yes` if you want to proceed.
meme.logoHelp: Makes a vexera logo with custom text!
misc.remindExample1: Vexera will remind you in 10 minutes to play Fortnite.
music.playerLag: Experiencing lag? Get dedicated resources with [Vexera Premium](https://vexera.io/premium)!
premium.bassStatus: The bass is currently set to `{{bass}}`
premium.bassHelp: Adjusts the bass for the music playing. Valid options: none, weak, medium, strong, insane, wtf
